name: All I Got Is A Gun
name_original: All I Got Is A Gun
description:
AIM: Shoot all the gold crystals to win (amount you need is in the top black bar).

CONTROLS: 

  • Move with W, A, S, D.
  • Shoot your gun by pressing A/D and left mouse click.
  • Walk over/collide with a blue orb to gain the "POWER OF THE ORB".
  • With the "POWER OF THE ORB!!", press W, A, S, D and left click to shoot the orb in the corresponding direction.

RULES:

  • STAY IN THE LIGHT CIRCLE! DO NOT GO INTO THE BLACK!
  • Enemies will spawn around the main character. If they hit the main character they will do damage.
  • If the main character stays in the black for too long, they will take damage.
  • Follow the arrow to the nearest Crystal.
  • The Crystal requires three hits to be destroyed.
  • If you get to 0 health, the game is over.

TIPS:

  • Use the blue orbs to kill enemies!
  • BUT... don't do this too many times, as each time a blue orb creates a space, that space gets smaller and the speed at which the space decreases increases!
  • BUT destorying a gold crystal will reset to the default space size and the defeault space decrease speed!

MUSIC: http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Rolemusic/ (song is called "The White")
